description: This file defines a React component ClientsPage that displays and manages a list of network clients/devices, showing details like MAC address, IP, connection quality, and block/unblock actions. It interacts with external services for data fetching and updating, and utilizes various custom components and context hooks for UI rendering and state management.

methods.name: useEffect
methods.description: React hook to run the load function once when the component mounts.

methods.name: filtered
methods.description: Memoized filtered list of clients based on the globalSearch term.

methods.name: columns
methods.description: Memoized array defining the structure and rendering of table columns for the DataTable.
